QuestData.Title: Down Kitty!
QuestData.Description: I tried to fight one of the jade tigers in the woods but they were too scary. They stare at you and you turn to a jade statue!$b$bHonest truth! Chen's sister's friend Ni heard it from Kai's mom.$b$bI want to be brave like you though. Can you show me how to beat up those jade tigers?
QuestData.RewardText: Wow! You were awesome! You were like *bam* and they were like *aaaaa* and then they were smashed!
